title: 2 Teens Shot on South Avenue in Syracuse, Car Flees Scene, Police Say
content:
Syracuse Police say two teens were shot just before 8 p.m. Tuesday near the S&R Convenience Store on South Avenue.
Two 16-year-old boys were injured, but are expected to survive the attack.
Investigators say the suspects drove away in a dark-colored sedan heading down Tallman Street.
Anyone with information is being asked to call Syracuse Police at 315-442-5222.
